name: mis-series
description: alexa utility for quickly building skills

scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd lib/src && zip -r lambda.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --region eu-west-1 --profile alexa --function-name ask-custom-alexa-skill-mis-series-default --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && cp "package.json" lib/src && cp -r src/documents lib/src && cd lib/src && npm install --production

author: Kinisoftware
